about_the_game:
Multibombers - Supporter Pack

It is optional to donate. Any money gained from this will be used to support the Developers. This is a Supporter package for Multibombers. By purchasing this pack, you'll get access to the following:
  • A golden name tag visible in matches.
  • A special Supporter tag in chat.
  • A golden "Multibombers Supporter" Discord role.
  • A special Discord channel for you to talk with other supporters and give exclusive suggestions.
  • Your name in the credits.

To claim the final three perks, please contact a member of our staff team .
detailed_description:
Multibombers - Supporter Pack

It is optional to donate. Any money gained from this will be used to support the Developers. This is a Supporter package for Multibombers. By purchasing this pack, you'll get access to the following:
  • A golden name tag visible in matches.
  • A special Supporter tag in chat.
  • A golden "Multibombers Supporter" Discord role.
  • A special Discord channel for you to talk with other supporters and give exclusive suggestions.
  • Your name in the credits.

To claim the final three perks, please contact a member of our staff team .
name: Multibombers - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 3Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run at an average 60FPS on low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 3Ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run at an average of 60FPS on high.

short_description: A supporter DLC package. You may optionally purchase this if you wish to have a golden nametag as well as a Supporter tag in the text chat.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Italian, German, Polish, Dutch
